name: A Hero's Mission
description:
This is a interactive fiction game created as a group project for SCTM2007 in OCADU.

It investigates internal meaningful choices to the player in the game story.

A single choice in the game can lead to a surprising or an awful end.

The characters have different personality that players will discover as they explore the game for many times. 

The rough story and structure, and visual images is presented by Yifan Liu.
The edited story, enhanced structure, text format, music and sounds is presented by Anran Zhou.
